Uses of Interface
org.softsmithy.lib.swing.action.XAction

  • Packages that use XAction 
    Package Description
    org.softsmithy.lib.swing.action
    Utility classes and extensions for the Swing Action Framework.

    • Uses of XAction in org.softsmithy.lib.swing.action

      Classes in org.softsmithy.lib.swing.action that implement XAction 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  AbstractXAction
      This class provides defaul implementations for the XAction interface.
      Note: The API may change in a future version!
      class  DefaultXAction
      Provides an empty actionPerformed method body.
      class  ReflectiveXAction
      A trampoline class that reflectivly calls an action method.
      class  XActionWrapper  
      Methods in org.softsmithy.lib.swing.action that return XAction 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      XAction StandardActionFactory.createXAction​(Object target, Locale locale)
      Creates an XAction for this standard action.
      static XAction XActions.createXAction​(String name, Object target, ResourceBundle rb)
      Creates a new XAction from a ResourceBundle.
      Methods in org.softsmithy.lib.swing.action with parameters of type XAction 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static void XActions.configureButton​(AbstractButton button, XAction action, ItemListener listener, IconType iconType, boolean showText, boolean coolStyle)
      Configures a button from a XAction.

      If cool style is set to true, then the border of the button will be drawn only if the mouse pointer is over the button.
      static void XActions.configureButton​(AbstractButton button, XAction action, ButtonGroup group, IconType iconType, boolean showText, boolean coolStyle)
      Configures a button from a XAction.

      If cool style is set to true, then the border of the button will be drawn only if the mouse pointer is over the button.
      static void XActions.configureButton​(AbstractButton button, XAction action, IconType iconType, boolean showText, boolean coolStyle)
      Configures a button from a XAction.

      If cool style is set to true, then the border of the button will be drawn only if the mouse pointer is over the button.
      void StandardActionFactory.configureXAction​(XAction action, Locale locale)
      Configures an XAction for this standard action.
      static void XActions.configureXAction​(XAction action, String name, ResourceBundle rb)
      Configures an XAction from a ResourceBundle.
      static JButton XActions.createButton​(XAction action, IconType iconType, boolean showText, boolean coolStyle)
      Creates a configured button.

      If cool style is set to true, then the border of the button will be drawn only if the mouse pointer is over the button.
      static JCheckBox XActions.createCheckBox​(XAction action, ItemListener listener, IconType iconType, boolean showText)
      Creates a configured check box.
      static JCheckBoxMenuItem XActions.createCheckBoxMenuItem​(XAction action, ItemListener listener, IconType iconType, boolean showText)
      Creates a configured check button menu item.
      static JMenuItem XActions.createMenuItem​(XAction action, IconType iconType, boolean showText)
      Creates a configured menu item.
      static JRadioButton XActions.createRadioButton​(XAction action, ButtonGroup group, IconType iconType, boolean showText)
      Creates a configured radio button.
      static JRadioButtonMenuItem XActions.createRadioButtonMenuItem​(XAction action, ButtonGroup group, IconType iconType, boolean showText)
      Creates a configured radio button menu item.
      static JToggleButton XActions.createToggleButton​(XAction action, ItemListener listener, IconType iconType, boolean showText, boolean coolStyle)
      Creates a configured toggle button.

      If cool style is set to true, then the border of the button will be drawn only if the mouse pointer is over the button.
      static JToggleButton XActions.createToggleButton​(XAction action, ButtonGroup group, IconType iconType, boolean showText, boolean coolStyle)
      Creates a configured toggle button.

      If cool style is set to true, then the border of the button will be drawn only if the mouse pointer is over the button.
